remarks:
Define the intersection of a class.  Definition 7.35 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 44.  For example, ` |^| { { 1 , 3 } , { 1 , 8 } } = { 1 } ` . Compare this with the intersection of two classes, ~ df-in . (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.) 

---

 Define the intersection of a class.  Definition 7.35 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 44.  For example, ` |^| ` { { 1 , 3 } , { 1 , 8 } } = { 1 } . Compare this with the intersection of two classes, ~ df-in . (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
statement:
df-int $p |- |^| A = { x | A. y ( y e. A -> x e. y ) } $.
$d A x y $.
